nodes.text: Dheno Rey was a Zabrak male who lived during the Cold War.
Dheno Rey was a male Zakrak. According to Rey, he encountered the pirate known as the Red Blade on the planet Hoth. Rey also claimed the Blade owed him credits.

During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, an agent of Imperial Intelligence, disguised as the Red Blade, visited the planet Hutta to convince Nem'ro the Hutt to ally with the Empire. Rey heard about the "Red Blade" visiting Hutta, and later encountered the imposter inside Nem'ro's Palace. He told the agent they didn't resemble the Red Blade, whom Rey claimed owed him credits, and demanded a payment to keep from revealing they were an impostor. The Imperial Agent refused and killed Rey.
This article assumes dark side options are chosen, meaning the agent kills Dheno Rey.
He can be flirted with by a female Imperial agent, as a result he neither blows the agent's cover nor ends up killed.
